patthana15.78:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ dassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nadassanena pahātabbahetuko
patthana15.78:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.78:2.1_0: Saraṇaṁ bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko
patthana15.78:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.78:3.1: Araṇaṁ nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
